title: 1.12暮色森林传送门无法生成，求解决
author: hang_xing520
txt_content: emmm我围了一圈花丢钻石没用[attach]1502677[/attach]

replies.author: Herdeny
replies.txt_content:
在配置文件里找到下列文字 
# Disable Twilight Forest portal creation entirely.  Provided for server operators looking to restrict action to the dimension.
    B:DisablePortalCreation=false复制代码
修改为
# Disable Twilight Forest portal creation entirely.  Provided for server operators looking to restrict action to the dimension.
    B:DisablePortalCreation=true复制代码

replies.author: Herdeny
replies.txt_content:
2333333我来了
我的服务器也无法生成
嗯 同问

replies.author: Herdeny
replies.txt_content:
hang_xing520 发表于 2020-3-15 12:28
求大佬解决qwq
怎么还撞头像…

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
你确定你装了暮色mod吗
首先在地上挖出2x2x1（边长最大为8格）格的坑（底部需要填满）并灌满非流动水（即对角线倒水或4格都倒水），然后四边用任意植物(包括枯死的灌木，树叶，草，蕨类)围起来（角落不需要），最后丢入一颗钻石，一道闪电从天而降，传送门就此开启。
